nodes.text: Verla Klest was an gas giant–type planet with nine moons that occupied the seventh orbital position around the star Abo. It was located within the Lehon system, a part of the Unknown Regions' area known as the Tempered Wastes.
Verla Klest was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Lehon system, and therefore Verla Klest, in grid square G-11.
